attr.title: Nightmare Frames
attr.desc: Nightmare Frames is a supernatural thriller where you'll step into the shoes of Alan Goldberg, in the search for the scariest horror film of all time. An enthralling journey through the streets of the Hollywood of the 80s, a small haunted town, and even Hell itself.
attr.inst: Download the free demo or purchase the game on Steam or Itch.io and copy English.tra and Nightmare Frames.exe (or Nightmare Frames Prologue.exe for the demo version) gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the free demo or purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1650590/Nightmare_Frames/) or [Itch.io](https://postmodernadventures.itch.io/nightmare-frames) and copy `English.tra` and `Nightmare Frames.exe` (or `Nightmare Frames Prologue.exe` for the demo version) to `gamedata` folder.
